Title: Agriculture
Dogma Condition 1: You may return a card from your hand. If you do, draw and score a card of value one higher than the card you returned.

Title: Archery
Dogma Condition 1: I demand you draw a 1, then transfer the highest card in your hand to my hand!

Title: City States
Dogma Condition 1: I demand you transfer a top card with a [Castle] from your board to my board if you have at least four [Castle] icons on your board! If you do, draw a 1!

Title: Clothing
Dogma Condition 1: Meld a card from your hand of different color from any card on your board.
Dogma Condition 2: Draw and score a 1 for each color present on your board not present on any other player's board.

Title: Code of Laws
Dogma Condition 1: You may tuck a card from your hand of the same color as any card on your board. If you do, you may splay that color of your cards left.

Title: Domestication
Dogma Condition 1: Meld the lowest card in your hand. Draw a 1.

Title: Masonry
Dogma Condition 1: You may meld any number of cards from your hand, each with a [Castle]. If you melded four or more cards, claim the Monument achievement.

Title: Metalworking
Dogma Condition 1: Draw and reveal a 1. If it has a [Castle], score it and repeat this dogma effect. Otherwise, keep it.

Title: Mysticism
Dogma Condition 1: Draw a 1. If it is the same color as any card on your board, meld it and draw a 1.

Title: Oars
Dogma Condition 1: I demand you transfer a card with a [Crown] from your hand to my score pile! If you do, draw a 1.
Dogma Condition 2: If no cards were transferred due to this demand, draw a 1.

Title: Pottery
Dogma Condition 1: You may return up to three cards from your hand. If you returned any cards, draw and score a card of value equal to the number of cards you returned.
Dogma Condition 2: Draw a 1.

Title: Sailing
Dogma Condition 1: Draw and meld a 1.

Title: The Wheel
Dogma Condition 1: Draw two 1.

Title: Tools
Dogma Condition 1: You may return three cards from your hand. If you do, draw and meld a 3.
Dogma Condition 2: You may return a 3 from your hand. If you do, draw three 1.

Title: Writing
Dogma Condition 1: Draw a 2.

Title: Calendar
Dogma Condition 1: If you have more cards in your score pile than in your hand, draw two 3.

Title: Canal Building
Dogma Condition 1: You may exchange all the highest cards in your hand with all the highest cards in your score pile.

Title: Construction
Dogma Condition 1: I demand you transfer two cards from your hand to my hand, then draw a 2!
Dogma Condition 2: If you are the only player with five top cards, claim the Empire achievement.

Title: Currency
Dogma Condition 1: You may return any number of cards from your hand. If you do, draw and score a 2 for every different value of card you returned.

Title: Fermenting
Dogma Condition 1: Draw a 2 for every two [Leaf] icons on your board.

Title: Mapmaking
Dogma Condition 1: I demand you transfer a 1 from your score pile to my score pile.
Dogma Condition 2: If any card was transferred due to the demand, draw and score a 1.

Title: Mathematics
Dogma Condition 1: You may return a card from your hand. If you do, draw and meld a card of value one higher than the card you returned.

Title: Monotheism
Dogma Condition 1: I demand you transfer a top card on your board of a different color from any card on my board to my score pile! If you do, draw and tuck a 1!
Dogma Condition 2: Draw and tuck a 1.

Title: Philosophy
Dogma Condition 1: You may splay left any one color of your cards.
Dogma Condition 2: You may score a card from your hand.

Title: Road Building
Dogma Condition 1: Meld one or two cards from your hand. If you melded two, you may transfer your top red card to another player's board. In exchange, transfer that player's top green card to your board.

Title: Alchemy
Dogma Condition 1: Draw and reveal a 4 for every three [Castle] icons on your board. If any of the drawn cards are red, return the cards drawn and all cards in your hand. Otherwise, keep them.
Dogma Condition 2: Meld a card from your hand, then score a card from your hand.

Title: Compass
Dogma Condition 1: I demand you transfer a top non-green card with a [Leaf] from your board to my board, and then transfer a top card without a [Leaf] from my board to your board.

Title: Education
Dogma Condition 1: You may return the highest card from your score pile. If you do, draw a card of value two higher than the highest card remaining in your score pile.

Title: Engineering
Dogma Condition 1: I demand you transfer all top cards with a [Castle] from your board to my score pile!
Dogma Condition 2: You may splay your red cards left.

Title: Feudalism
Dogma Condition 1: I demand you transfer a card with a [Castle] from your hand to my hand!
Dogma Condition 2: You may splay your yellow or purple cards left.

Title: Machinery
Dogma Condition 1: I demand you exchange all cards in your hand with all the highest cards in my hand!
Dogma Condition 2: Score a card from your hand with a [Castle]. You may splay your red cards left.

Title: Medicine
Dogma Condition 1: I demand you exchange the highest card in your score pile with the lowest card in my score pile!

Title: Optics
Dogma Condition 1: Draw and meld a 3. If it has a [Crown], draw and score a 4. Otherwise, transfer a card from your score pile to the score pile of an opponent with fewer points than you.

Title: Paper
Dogma Condition 1: You may splay your green or blue cards left.
Dogma Condition 2: Draw a 4 for every color you have splayed left.

Title: Translation
Hexagon (info only): Hieroglyph and two letters in the demotic script
Dogma Condition 1: You may meld all the cards in your score pile. If you meld one, you must meld them all.
Dogma Condition 2: If each top card on your board has a [Crown], claim the World achievement.

Title: Anatomy
Dogma Condition 1: I demand you return a card from your score pile! If you do, return a top card of equal value from your board!

Title: Colonialism
Dogma Condition 1: Draw and tuck a 3. If it has a [Crown], repeat this dogma effect.

Title: Enterprise
Dogma Condition 1: I demand you transfer a top non-purple card with a [Crown] from your board to my board! If you do, draw and meld a 4!
Dogma Condition 2: You may splay your green cards right.

Title: Experimentation
Dogma Condition 1: Draw and meld a 5.

Title: Gunpowder
Dogma Condition 1: I demand you transfer a top card with a [Castle] from your board to my score pile!
Dogma Condition 2: If any card was transferred due to the demand, draw and score a 2.

Title: Invention
Dogma Condition 1: You may splay right any one color of your cards currently splayed left. If you do, draw and score a 4.
Dogma Condition 2: If you have five colors splayed, each in any direction, claim the Wonder achievement.

Title: Navigation
Dogma Condition 1: I demand you transfer a 2 or 3 from your score pile to my score pile!

Title: Perspective
Dogma Condition 1: You may return a card from your hand. If you do, score a card from your hand for every two [LIghtbulb] icons on your board.

Title: Printing Press
Dogma Condition 1: You may return a card from your score pile. If you do, draw a card of value two higher than the top purple card on your board.
Dogma Condition 2: You may splay your blue cards right.

Title: Reformation
Dogma Condition 1: You may tuck a card from your hand for every two [Leaf] icons on your board.
Dogma Condition 2: You may splay your yellow or purple cards right.

Title: Astronomy
Dogma Condition 1: Draw and reveal a 6. If the card is green or blue, meld it and repeat this dogma effect.
Dogma Condition 2: If all non-purple top cards on your board are value 6 or higher, claim the Universe achievement.

Title: Banking
Hexagon (info only): Two piles of notes and a coin
Dogma Condition 1: I demand you transfer a top non-green card with a [Factory] from your board to my board! If you do, draw and score a 5.
Dogma Condition 2: You may splay your green cards right.

Title: Chemistry
Dogma Condition 1: You may splay your blue cards right.
Dogma Condition 2: Draw and score a card of value one higher than the highest top card on your board and then return a card from your score pile.

Title: Coal
Hexagon (info only): Lumps of coal or a fossil
Dogma Condition 1: Draw and tuck a 5.
Dogma Condition 2: You may splay your red cards right.
Dogma Condition 3: You may score any one of your top cards. If you do, also score the card beneath it.

Title: Measurement
Dogma Condition 1: You may return a card from your hand. If you do, splay any one color of your cards right, and draw a card of value equal to the number of cards of that color on your board.

Title: Physics
Dogma Condition 1: Draw three 6 and reveal them. If two or more of the drawn cards are of the same color, return the drawn cards and all the cards in your hand. Otherwise, keep them.

Title: The Pirate Code
Dogma Condition 1: I demand you transfer two cards of value 4 or less from your score pile to my score pile!
Dogma Condition 2: If any card was transferred due to the demand, score the lowest top card with a [Crown] from your board.

Title: Societies
Dogma Condition 1: I demand you transfer a top non-purple card with a [Lightbulb] from your board to my board! If you do, draw a 5!

Title: Statistics
Dogma Condition 1: I demand you draw the highest card in your score pile! If you do, and have only one card in your hand afterwards, repeat this demand!
Dogma Condition 2: You may splay your yellow cards right.

Title: Steam Engine
Dogma Condition 1: Draw and tuck two 4, then score your bottom yellow card.

Title: Atomic Theory
Dogma Condition 1: You may splay your blue cards right.
Dogma Condition 2: Draw and meld a 7.

Title: Canning
Dogma Condition 1: You may draw and tuck a 6. If you do, score all your top cards without a [Factory].
Dogma Condition 2: You may splay your yellow cards right.

Title: Classification
Dogma Condition 1: Reveal the color of a card from your hand. Take into your hand all cards of that color from all other player's hands. Then, meld all cards of that color from your hand.

Title: Democracy
Hexagon (info only): two multiple choice squares, with the bottom one checked off
Dogma Condition 1: You may return any number of cards from your hand. If you have returned more cards than any other player due to Democracy this phase, draw and score an 8.

Title: Emancipation
Dogma Condition 1: I demand you transfer a card from your hand to my score pile! If you do, draw a 6!
Dogma Condition 2: You may splay your red or purple cards right.

Title: Encyclopedia
Hexagon (info only): Large pile of book, with an open book at the top
Dogma Condition 1: You may meld all the highest cards in your score pile. If you meld one of the highest, you must meld all of the highest.

Title: Industrialization
Dogma Condition 1: Draw and tuck a 6 for every two [Factory] icons on your board.
Dogma Condition 2: You may splay your red or purple cards right.

Title: Machine Tools
Dogma Condition 1: Draw and score a card of value equal to the highest card in your score pile.

Title: Metric System
Dogma Condition 1: If your green cards are splayed right, you may splay any color of your cards right.
Dogma Condition 2: You may splay your green cards right.

Title: Vaccination
Dogma Condition 1: I demand you return all the lowest cards in your score pile! If you returned any, draw and meld a 6!
Dogma Condition 2: If any card was returned as a result of the demand, draw and meld a 7.

Title: Bicycle
Dogma Condition 1: You may exchange all the cards in your hand with all the cards in your score pile. If you exchange one, you must exchange them all.

Title: Combustion
Dogma Condition 1: I demand you transfer two cards from your score pile to my score pile!

Title: Electricity
Dogma Condition 1: Return all your top cards without a [Factory], then draw an 8 for each card you returned.

Title: Evolution
Hexagon (info only): Puddle with two organisms, or an amoeba
Dogma Condition 1:
You may choose to either draw and score an 8 and then return a card from your score pile,
or draw a card of value one higher than the highest card in your score pile.

Title: Explosives
Dogma Condition 1: I demand you transfer your three highest cards from your hand to my hand! If you do, and then have no cards in hand, draw a 7!

Title: Lighting
Dogma Condition 1: You may tuck up to three cards from your hand. If you do, draw and score a 7 for every different value of card you tucked.

Title: Publications
Dogma Condition 1: You may rearrange the order of one color of cards on your board.
Dogma Condition 2: You may splay your yellow or blue cards up.

Title: Railroad
Dogma Condition 1: Return all cards from your hand, then draw three 6.
Dogma Condition 2: You may splay up any one color of your cards currently splayed right.

Title: Refrigeration
Dogma Condition 1: I demand you return half (rounded down) of the cards in your hand!
Dogma Condition 2: You may score a card from your hand.

Title: Sanitation
Dogma Condition 1: I demand you exchange the two highest cards in your hand with the lowest card in my hand!

Title: Antibiotics
Dogma Condition 1: You may return up to three cards from your hand. For every different value of card that you returned, draw two 8.

Title: Corporations
Dogma Condition 1: I demand you transfer a top non-green card with a [Factory] from your board to my score pile! If you do, draw and meld an 8.
Dogma Condition 2: Draw and meld an 8.

Title: Empiricism
Dogma Condition 1: Choose two colors, then draw and reveal a 9. If it is either of the colors you chose, meld it and you may splay your cards of that color up.
Dogma Condition 2: If you have twenty or more [Lightbulb] icons on your board, you win.

Title: Flight
Dogma Condition 1: If your red cards are splayed up, you may splay any one color of your cards up.
Dogma Condition 2: You may splay your red cards up.

Title: Mass Media
Dogma Condition 1: You may return a card from your hand. If you do, choose a value, and return all cards of that value from all score piles.
Dogma Condition 2: You may splay your purple cards up.

Title: Mobility
Dogma Condition 1: I demand you transfer your two highest non-red cards without a [Factory] from your board to my score pile! If you transferred any cards, draw an 8!

Title: Quantum Theory
Dogma Condition 1: You may return up to two cards from your hand. If you return two, draw a 10 and then draw and score a 10.

Title: Rocketry
Dogma Condition 1: Return a card in any other player's score pile for every two [Clock] icons on your board.

Title: Skyscrapers
Dogma Condition 1: I demand you transfer a top non-yellow card with a [Clock] from your board to my board! If you do, score the card beneath it, and return all other cards from that pile!

Title: Socialism
Dogma Condition 1: You may tuck all cards from your hand. If you tuck one, you must tuck them all. If you tucked at least one purple card, take all the lowest cards in each other player's hand into your hand.

Title: Collaboration
Dogma Condition 1: I demand you draw two 9 and reveal them. Transfer the card of my choice to my board, and meld the other.
Dogma Condition 2: If you have ten or more green cards on your board, you win.

Title: Composites
Dogma Condition 1: I demand you transfer all but one card from your hand to my hand! Also, transfer the highest card from your score pile to my score pile!

Title: Computers
Dogma Condition 1: You may splay your red cards or your green cards up.
Dogma Condition 2: Draw and meld a 10, then execute its non-demand dogma effects for yourself only.

Title: Ecology
Dogma Condition 1: You may return a card from your hand. If you do, score a card from your hand and draw two 10.

Title: Fission
Dogma Condition 1: I demand you draw a 10! If it is red, remove all hands, boards, and score piles from the game! If this occurs, the dogma action is complete.
Dogma Condition 2: Return a top card other than Fission from any player's board.

Title: Genetics
Dogma Condition 1: Draw and meld a 10. Score all cards beneath it.

Title: Satellites
Dogma Condition 1: Return all cards from your hand, and draw three 8.
Dogma Condition 2: You may splay your purple cards up.
Dogma Condition 3: Meld a card from your hand and then execute each of its non-demand dogma effects for yourself only.

Title: Services
Dogma Condition 1: I demand you transfer all the highest cards from your score pile to my hand! If you transferred any cards, then transfer a top card from my board without a [Leaf] to your hand!

Title: Specialization
Dogma Condition 1: Reveal a card from your hand. Take into your hand the top card of that color from all other players' boards.
Dogma Condition 2: You may splay your yellow or blue cards up.

Title: Suburbia
Hexagon (info only): three large houses, 2.6 kids and a dog in each
Dogma Condition 1: You may tuck any number of cards from your hand. Draw and score a 1 for each card you tucked.

Title: A.I.
Dogma Condition 1: Draw and score a 10.
Dogma Condition 2: If Robotics and Software are top cards on any board, the single player with the lowest score wins.

Title: Bioengineering
Dogma Condition 1: Transfer a top card with a [Leaf] from any other player's board to your score pile.
Dogma Condition 2: If any player has fewer than three [Leaf] icons on their board, the single player with the most [Leaf] icons on their board wins.

Title: Databases
Dogma Condition 1: I demand you return half (rounded up) of the cards in your score pile!

Title: Globalization
Dogma Condition 1: I demand you return a top card with a [Leaf] on your board!
Dogma Condition 2: Draw and score a 6. If no player has more [Leaf] icons than [Factory] icons on their board, the single player with the most points wins.

Title: Miniaturization
Dogma Condition 1: You may return a card from your hand. If you returned a 10, draw a 10 for every different value of card in your score pile.

Title: Robotics
Dogma Condition 1: Score your top green card. Draw and meld a 10, then execute its non-demand dogma effects for yourself only.

Title: Self Service
Dogma Condition 1: Execute the non-demand dogma effects of any other top card on your board for yourself only.
Dogma Condition 2: If you have more achievements than each other player, you win.

Title: Software
Dogma Condition 1: Draw and score a 10.
Dogma Condition 2: Draw and meld two 10, then execute the second card's non-demand dogma effects for yourself only.

Title: Stem Cells
Dogma Condition 1: You may score all cards from your hand. If you score one, you must score them all.

Title: The Internet
Dogma Condition 1: You may splay your green cards up.
Dogma Condition 2: Draw and score a 10.
Dogma Condition 3: Draw and meld a 10 for every two [Clock] icons on your board.
